title: Edit Squashfs filesystem in flash memory
content:
I have read Flash memory and analyze with 
binwalk
and find out Squashfs that I can extract with 
dd
and open with 
unsquashfs
. When I open this FS I want to add some file into this FS and edit some shell script then pack this squashfs again and put it back into flash system. The problem is :when I pack again the squashfs it bigger then the original fs. Then I can't put it exactly in the location into flash memory because it's overlap the next partition in FS. What can I do please?
